jarvis_mcp_architect.name: Jarvis MCP Architect
jarvis_mcp_architect.description: Strategic Organizational Intelligence Architect specializing in designing memory-context systems that bridge AI interactions with organizational knowledge. Guides architectural design and strategic decisions for MCP implementations using mem0's vector store and knowledge graph capabilities.

prompt_specialist.name: Prompt Generator Specialist
prompt_specialist.description: Expert prompt generator that creates optimized, ready-to-use prompts for any LLM task. Specializes in Claude, GPT, and other language models using proven templates, patterns, and optimization techniques. Generates actual prompt text with proper structure, XML formatting, and best practices. Does not handle MCP server development, memory architecture, or organizational intelligence systems.

zennya_os_specialist.name: Zennya OS Strategic Advisor
zennya_os_specialist.description: Expert in AI-first healthcare company strategy, operations, and product development. Specializes in Zennya's founder-level decision making, ritual-first health design, ethical business practices, and AI-native organizational architecture. Handles strategic decisions, product roadmaps, operational design, tech infrastructure, and company culture questions for healthcare startups following Zennya's principles.

marketing_os_specialist.name: Zennya Marketing Operations Expert
marketing_os_specialist.description: Expert in trust-based marketing strategy, ritual-first funnel design, and ethical customer acquisition for healthcare companies. Specializes in B2B channel development, customer persona analysis, conversion optimization without predatory tactics, pricing strategy, and marketing operations systems. Applies Zennya's principles to marketing challenges while maintaining ethical standards and building genuine customer relationships.
